name: Juan Meza
description: I HOPE TO FIND THAT SPECIAL LADY I HAVE LONGED HOPED AND THOUGHT OF HAVING AS A WIFE….A WOMAN I CAN CALL MY OWN, AND SHE WILL BE LOVING AND CARING AT ALL TIMES, AS I AM A GOD FEARING ENTITY, I WILL LIKE HER TO BE THE SAME…AND I AM A WIDOWER, AND I HOPE SHE LOVES ME FOR WHO I AM AND NOT MY WEALTH.
